title: 1898 Italian Football Championship
text:
The 1898 <a href="Italian%20Football%20Championship">Italian Football Championship</a> was a major event in the footballing history of <a href="Italy">Italy</a>. It was the first <a href="FIGC">FIGC</a>-endorsed league competition which is considered an official predecessor of <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a>.
It was a knock-out tournament involving three clubs from <a href="Turin">Turin</a> and one from <a href="Genoa">Genoa</a>. All three matches were played at the "<a href="Velodromo%20Umberto%20I">Velodromo Umberto I</a>" in <a href="Turin">Turin</a> on 8 May, over the course of the one day. The winner of this first-ever season was <a href="Genoa%20C.F.C.">Genoa</a>.
